title: Iriakan d'Jorasco
text: The [[House Jorasco enclave|Jorasco Enclave (Stormreach)]] in [[Stormreach]] is managed by Iriakan d’Jorasco. A recent immigrant from the [[Talenta Plains]], Iriakan is eager to improve the house’s influence throughout [[Stormreach]] and offers bargains to adventurers who help him with this goal.
